 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנַן‎</span>] **verb** ==whet, sharpen== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁנִינָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sharp***, etc.; Ethiopic [<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">] III, 2, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***contend, litigate***; hence <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁן‎</span> ***tooth***, Late Hebrew ***id.***, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šinnu***</u></abbr>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שִׁנָּא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Qal** ***whet, sharpen: Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִם שַׁנּוֺתִ֫י בְּרַק חַרְבִּי‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:67ee»§ 67ee</sup>) [[Deut.32.41|Deut 32:41]], of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s preparation for judgment; 3 plural (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַחֶרֶב‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָֽׁנְנוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשׁוֺנָם‎</span> [[Ps.64.4|Ps 64:4]]; [[Ps.140.4|Ps 140:4]] of uttering sharp words; ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנוּנִים‎</span> ***sharpened***, of arrows, [[Isa.5.28|Isa 5:28]]; [[Ps.45.6|Ps 45:6]], figurative of tongue [[Ps.120.4|Ps 120:4]], of false witness [[Prov.25.18|Prov 25:18]]. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשִׁנַּנְתָּם לְבָנֶיךָ‎</span> [[Deut.6.7|Deut 6:7]] i.e. teach the words ***incisively***, German 'einschärfen.' **Hithpo\`el** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular [[Ps.73.21|Ps 73:21]] in my kidneys <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׁתּוֺנָ֑ן‎</span> ***I was pierced*** (of poignant envy). 



 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁנן‎</span> (√ of following; see Biblical Hebrew [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׁנַן‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שֵׁן‎</span>).
